name: Hunt of the Canon
description:
This game is a alpha, so not complete yet. the game may have some buggs and will get alot more levels. The money u pay to test the game will help me get this to its final state. Its a hardcore horror based game and i hope u will enjoy it,. U will need winrar to open the folder and extract it to the folder u want to.

pros

- High skill cap if not exploided one way or the other. -Fun to let friends play it and have a great time watching each other fail.

And make sure you keep looking for updates on this site and redownload the game with it. Might make a laucher with updater later.

Also co-op multiplayer will later be added but when thats all completely done the price of this game will be alot higher will alot more levels so make sure u get the now in alpha so support me and save yourself some money.

- open world

- isnt hard to run

- great controlss

- decent graphics

- 3rd person / first person camera

cons

- not alot of levels yet

- can be repeatable

- if you die when u almost completed it you will jump out the window

-death = death

- can be scary somehow :)

donate me on paypal on kim1519@hotmail.nl if you liked the game and want to help its progress!
